articles.title: Europe's Vega C rocket fails on 2nd-ever mission, 2 satellites lost - Space.com
articles.description: The Vega C was carrying two spacecraft for Airbus' Pléiades Neo Earth-imaging constellation.
articles.content:
The second mission of Europe's new Vega C rocket did not go according to plan.
The medium-lift Vega C lifted off from Europe's Spaceport in Kourou, French Guiana on Tuesday (Dec. 20) at 8:47 p.m. ES… [+3422 chars]

articles.title: Surging illnesses spur demand for key medications - Global Times
articles.description: Europe and North America have seen shortages of the key antibiotic amoxicillin and other medications as surging illnesses particularly among children have increased demand for the drugs.
articles.content:
